name: Magnum Bullets: The Trouble With Elder gods Linux edition
name_original: Magnum Bullets: The Trouble With Elder gods Linux edition
description: Magnum Bullets: The Trouble With Elder gods has been a long in development project that over the, almost 2 years has been rebuilt from the ground up in 4 different game engines, numerous script rewrites, and game play rewrites until it just felt right. Magnum Bullets is slated for a series that will span different genres in a evolving story line.
